author: jonl
msg: Extracted trivial reject case and inverted loop logic to make more efficient and more readable too.

author: jonl
msg: On second thought, I generally hate checking for null and throwing IllegalArgumentExceptions.  ;-)  So I'm removing the checks.  Especially since no additional information is really added and the performance of this method matters.

author: jonl
msg: Performance improvements for Strings.replaceAll() method.  This implementation is a lot more straightforward than the commons method and I suspect it will be fast as well.  If it doesn't beat or roughly equal the commons method, we can replace it.

author: jonl
msg: Fixed problem where error pages failing could cause recursive redirection.
In doing this, added Page.isErrorPage() method that returns false by default.
Error pages override this to let RequestCycle know when a recursive failure
Moved WebResource from http protocol package to markup.html package, which
seems more appropriate since it's used in web markup by ImageResource which
